title: V.A.- Heaven And Hell The Best Of Metal.......1980  2015 320ak
description:
Metal at the end of the 70's Was in flux and yet the best was on its way.  We all were hella bummed by Bon Scott's untimely death.  Black Sabbath was gonna give us some Dio. We had the Blizzard of Oz and Sabbath too.  And there was so much coming its kinda overwhelming to look back.  
Some were fooled by the Hair Metal clones.

But they were all of one same beat. and they did not have a pit worth gettin into. 
I remember being in a Iron Maiden/Fastway and Saxon show pit. I dont know how I made it out everybody wore leathers and spikes and those fuckin things on the forearms
it was covered with spikes and studs and blood! And that shit was not costume jewelery.
That thing could end ya.
Going into a good pit back then was like going into the coliseum but not the Oakland Alameda Co. one. more like the one that Russell Crowe was the champion in! But I survived it, I had to I was not gonna miss what was coming. 
But thats down the road a bit. 
We are at the beginning of the 80's Reagan was coming in and Georgia regained its most famous peanut farmer. And we got this tracklist....  



    Accept - I'm A Rebel
    Acdc - Shoot To Thrill
    Alice Cooper - Grim Facts
    Black Sabbath - Heaven And Hell
    Deep Purple - King Of Dreams
    Def Leppard - When The Walls Came Tumbling Down
    Diamond Head - Am I Evil
    Dokken - We're Going Wrong
    Gary Moore - Hot Gossip
    Iron Maiden - Iron Maiden
    Judas Priest - Breaking The Law
    Kiss - Naked City
    Krokus - Fire
    M.S.G. - Into The Arena
    Motorhead - Ace Of Spades
    Ozzy Osbourne - Crazy Train
    Quiet Riot - Killer Girls
    Rainbow - Since You Been Gone
    Saxon - 747 (Strangers In The Night)
    Scorpions - Only A Man
    U.F.O. - Lettin' Go
    Uriah Heep - Feelings
    Whitesnake - Fool For Your Loving
    Triumph - I Live For The Weekend
    The Who - Who Are You
